source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
        [Customer Group Code],
        [Customer No_],
        [DLP Target Qty],
        [End Date],
        [Item No_],
        [Item Unit of Measure],
        [Last Modified],
        [Modified user Id],
        [Month],
        [Pack Group Code],
        [Pack Title],
        [Route Code],
        [Start Date],
        [Target Qty],
        [timestamp],
        [Year],
	   'AP' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - ANDHRA PRADESH$Cust Target]
where year([Year]) >= 2021 and year([Year]) < 2023
UNION ALL
SELECT
        [Customer Group Code],
        [Customer No_],
        [DLP Target Qty],
        [End Date],
        [Item No_],
        [Item Unit of Measure],
